titles.title: Protecting Senior's Nest Egg Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the temporary waiver of the required minimum distribution rules for certain retirement plans and accounts for an additional year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/9/2009--Introduced.
Protecting Senior's Nest Egg Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the suspension of minimum distribution rules for tax-deferred retirement plans.
